title: Sajid Javid – 2016 Speech on Britain’s Young People
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills, at East Wintergarden, Canary Wharf, London on 4 February 2016.
